info.name: Sleek Showdown
info.description:
Custom personal Showdown style based on Varrio's Pokemon Showdown - Minimalism style (https://userstyles.org/styles/178859/pok-mon-showdown-minimalism). I'm a complete amateur at CSS so apologies if anything breaks.

Highly recommend 175% zoom on your browser. It's what I play on and what I used while working on this style.

** THE STYLE MAY BREAK IF SHOWDOWN IS ZOOMED IN TOO MUCH OR PLAYED IN A RESOLUTION WITH LOW HEIGHT. SORRY **
Features:
- Transparent HP bar backgrounds
- Black background on stat changes
- Space background in battles (currently only background)
- Rating shown for both player and opponent
- A cute cat in the top left


Credits from Varrio's style:
Header: https://userstyles.org/styles/99306/pok-mon-showdown-skin
Battle Engine: https://userstyles.org/styles/180579/showdown-pro-v4-03-beta
